Text:
I was already aware of We Have Arrived and Bruce Campbell [both epic] before I bought the album, but once I got the CD and put it in, I was particularly impressed with Guinevere - rapping out Arthurian legend is nerdy awesomeness.
you're welcome; that's what I'm here for.
Lars had transcended that genre, but it's still an important *part* of his music, a part that's on full display here.

:)
Finally decided to add "Birth of a Phish" and "Kidney Stones For Easter"; they're here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6238654
